title: Countries with the most affected people from earthquakes 1900 to 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.
There is a difference of 67.5 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Haiti.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of affected people (in millions) for 10 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Number of affected people (in millions) and Haiti has the lowest Number of affected people (in millions).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Number of affected people (in millions) 70.9 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Haiti where Country is 3.4.
There is a difference of 67.5 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Haiti.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of affected people (in millions) in each Country on the y axis.
Country China has the highest Number of affected people (in millions) and Haiti has the lowest Number of affected people (in millions).
Country India has the second highest value for Number of affected people (in millions).
The difference of Number of affected people (in millions) between the highest and lowest Country is 67.5.
Number of affected people (in millions) at Country China is 70.9 , second place is India at 26.18, and thirdly is Chile at 8.53.
The Country China tends to be 4.89 percent higher than average.
